Title: Debra
Plot: Alex has a romantic encounter with the woman who is married to the dean of Blue Mountain State, but the situation grows even more problematic for him when he discovers that the same woman was previously married to Coach Daniels.
ParentalRatingReason: Sex scenes, drug use & content that may offend
GuestStars: Frankie Shaw, Page Kennedy, Omari Newton, Rob Ramsay, Denise Richards
